name: Tata Punch
description: The price of Tata Punch, a 5 seater Compact SUV, ranges from Rs. 6.13  - 10.20 Lakh. It is available in 26 variants, with an engine of 1199 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Punch has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 2 airbags. Tata Punch has a ground clearance of 187 mm  and is available in 9 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 18.8 to 26.99 kmpl for Punch.
